fields.name: 创建人
fields.sql: select user.nickname as `value`, edu_employee.id as `key` from edu_employee inner join user on user.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id = ${employee_id}

fields.name: 创建人
fields.sql: select user.nickname as `value`, edu_employee.id as `key` from edu_employee inner join user on user.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id = ${employee_id}

fields.name: 所属教师
fields.sql: select user.nickname as `value`, edu_employee.id as `key` from edu_employee inner join user on user.id = edu_employee.user_id where edu_employee.id = ${teacher_id} and edu_employee.is_teacher = 1
